archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0368
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a VF employer, I want to be able to pay commission on connections and devices sold, as that I can reward my sales people appropriately.

properties.value: Out of Comarch, we assume that commision calculation is out of Comarch solution, required data can be exported. To be checked internally by VFNZ. External comission system to be defined.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
